job_data.title: Social Interaction Product Manager-TikTok Short Video
job_data.description:
Responsibilities


Team Introduction The Global Product \& RD team is building up core TikTok products to ensure TikTok deliver the best product experience to all of our users, build the most attractive features to help users enjoy their time on TikTok, earn trust in privacy protection, and more. The Global Product team is growing exponentially. The business lines are ranging from Monetization Technology, Data, Machine Learning, System, Infrastructure, AR Effects, Security Technology and more. Responsibilities \- Understand users’ social needs on short video platforms and explore new social interaction features \- Lead the design and implementation of related social functions \- Set measurable goals and collaborate with design, algorithms, and other teams to accelerate social business growth


Qualifications


Minimum Qualifications \- 2\+ years of experience in internet social/community/creative tools products \- Strong passion and curiosity for social products; enthusiastic about exploring new products \- Excellent empathy, strong self\-motivation, rigorous logical thinking, outstanding communication skills, and the ability to solve complex problems \- Data\-sensitive, with some data analysis skills, and the ability to interpret the meaning and value behind the data Preferred Qualifications \- Working experience in direct messaging or creator experience


Job Information


【For Pay Transparency】Compensation Description (Annually)

  

 The base salary range for this position in the selected city is $149040 \- $311600 annually.  



Compensation may vary outside of this range depending on a number of factors, including a candidate’s qualifications, skills, competencies and experience, and location. Base pay is one part of the Total Package that is provided to compensate and recognize employees for their work, and this role may be eligible for additional discretionary bonuses/incentives, and restricted stock units.  



Benefits may vary depending on the nature of employment and the country work location. Employees have day one access to medical, dental, and vision insurance, a 401(k) savings plan with company match, paid parental leave, short\-term and long\-term disability coverage, life insurance, wellbeing benefits, among others. Employees also receive 10 paid holidays per year, 10 paid sick days per year and 17 days of Paid Personal Time (prorated upon hire with increasing accruals by tenure).  



The Company reserves the right to modify or change these benefits programs at any time, with or without notice.  



For Los Angeles County (unincorporated) Candidates:  



Qualified applicants with arrest or conviction records will be considered for employment in accordance with all federal, state, and local laws including the Los Angeles County Fair Chance Ordinance for Employers and the California Fair Chance Act. Our company believes that criminal history may have a direct, adverse and negative relationship on the following job duties, potentially resulting in the withdrawal of the conditional offer of employment:  



1\. Interacting and occasionally having unsupervised contact with internal/external clients and/or colleagues;  



2\. Appropriately handling and managing confidential information including proprietary and trade secret information and access to information technology systems; and  



3\. Exercising sound judgment.  



About TikTok

  

 TikTok is the leading destination for short\-form mobile video. At TikTok, our mission is to inspire creativity and bring joy. TikTok's global headquarters are in Los Angeles and Singapore, and we also have offices in New York City, London, Dublin, Paris, Berlin, Dubai, Jakarta, Seoul, and Tokyo.  



Why Join Us

  

 Inspiring creativity is at the core of TikTok's mission. Our innovative product is built to help people authentically express themselves, discover and connect – and our global, diverse teams make that possible. Together, we create value for our communities, inspire creativity and bring joy \- a mission we work towards every day.  



We strive to do great things with great people. We lead with curiosity, humility, and a desire to make impact in a rapidly growing tech company. Every challenge is an opportunity to learn and innovate as one team. We're resilient and embrace challenges as they come. By constantly iterating and fostering an "Always Day 1" mindset, we achieve meaningful breakthroughs for ourselves, our company, and our users. When we create and grow together, the possibilities are limitless. Join us.  



Diversity \& Inclusion  



TikTok is committed to creating an inclusive space where employees are valued for their skills, experiences, and unique perspectives. Our platform connects people from across the globe and so does our workplace. At TikTok, our mission is to inspire creativity and bring joy. To achieve that goal, we are committed to celebrating our diverse voices and to creating an environment that reflects the many communities we reach. We are passionate about this and hope you are too.  



TikTok Accommodation

  

 TikTok is committed to providing reasonable accommodations in our recruitment processes for candidates with disabilities, pregnancy, sincerely held religious beliefs or other reasons protected by applicable laws. If you need assistance or a reasonable accommodation, please reach out to us at
 https://tinyurl.com/RA\-request

job_data.title: Product Manager, Infrastructure Platform - San Jose
job_data.description:
Responsibilities


Our Infrastructure Engineering team build and operate hyper\-scale datacenters, manage the life cycle of server fleet, allocate cloud resources and create various cloud solutions, and provide infrastructure services including widely distributed Content Distribution Networks (CDNs). The team build and leverage various platforms to manage and interact with our infrastructures and services. To support the fast growth and improve operation efficiency, these platforms need to be feature rich, easy to use, scalable, agile and compliant to with policies and procedures. Responsibilities \- What You'll Do • Work collaboratively with engineering, UI/UX, and other cross\-functional teams on cutting edge technologies to define infrastructure platforms. • Understand the cloud and physical data center ecosystem, market, competition, and user requirements in depth. • Evaluate industry innovations and technology platforms, and identify partnership and collaboration opportunities. • Decompose complex solutions into iterative chunks of work, and make the difficult and high\-judgment trade\-offs between features and time\-to\-market. • Create strategic product roadmaps, coordinate and manage the product development schedule.


Qualifications


Minimum Qualifications: \- Hands\-on experience in designing and managing server fleet management, server operation, system engineering or data center engineering and operation software and services. \- Hands\-on experience in delivering product requirement documents and product design using software such as Figma, etc. \- Experience in at least one major cloud provider's services, e.g. AWS, Azure, GCP, OCI, Ali Cloud, etc. \- Experience in driving product vision, go\-to\-market strategy, and design discussions. \- Experience with agile project management and tools such as Jira. Preferred Qualifications \- Master’s degree (or Bachelor's degree with 3 years of experience) in Computer Science or related engineering fields. \- 2 years experience in building/shipping cloud and infrastructure products, and familiar with product development life cycles. \- Strong communication skills to manage a large degree of interaction with cross\-functional teams and customers. \- Ability to influence multiple stakeholders without direct authority. \- Ability to articulate product requirements per the audience (high level to deep low level technical). \- Good understanding of cloud infrastructure security requirements.


Job Information


【For Pay Transparency】Compensation Description (Annually)

  

 The base salary range for this position in the selected city is $122360 \- $246400 annually.  



Compensation may vary outside of this range depending on a number of factors, including a candidate’s qualifications, skills, competencies and experience, and location. Base pay is one part of the Total Package that is provided to compensate and recognize employees for their work, and this role may be eligible for additional discretionary bonuses/incentives, and restricted stock units.  



Benefits may vary depending on the nature of employment and the country work location. Employees have day one access to medical, dental, and vision insurance, a 401(k) savings plan with company match, paid parental leave, short\-term and long\-term disability coverage, life insurance, wellbeing benefits, among others. Employees also receive 10 paid holidays per year, 10 paid sick days per year and 17 days of Paid Personal Time (prorated upon hire with increasing accruals by tenure).  



The Company reserves the right to modify or change these benefits programs at any time, with or without notice.

Why Join Us

job_data.title: Global Product Marketing Manager, Trust and Safety
job_data.description:
Responsibilities


About the Team TikTok is a platform rooted in creativity and has played a critical role in enabling positive creative expression with our global community of users \& creators. We are looking for an insights\-driven product marketer to oversee key global Trust and Safety marketing initiatives. About The Role This is a critical role that requires strong partnerships with cross\-functional and regional teams to accelerate adoption and increase understanding of the key TikTok product verticals of Trust, Safety and Privacy, across audiences and countries. This role will also grow org capabilities and execution across competitive strategy, user insights, measurement and regional storytelling. The ideal candidate will bring a depth of functional product marketing expertise along with a proven track record of close partnership with product managers. Experience in brand safety narratives and campaigns, trust and safety marketing, and reputation building story\-telling and product marketing will be a plus. Responsibilities \- Help shape, and promote important Trust and Safety narratives, programs, and product launches globally \- In collaboration with cross\-functional teams, execute Trust \& Safety product marketing roadmaps, set measure\-able results, own user \& competitive insights, shape product \& external messaging, and execute across channels. \- Work cross\-functionally to improve the visibility of Trust \& Safety and product marketing efforts; developing a continuous flow of communication among relevant teams. \- Be the voice of Product to Marketing, and the voice of Marketing to Product: drive alignment across product and business teams for the purpose of unifying our vision and goals for key user audiences in local markets. \- Spearhead global consistency in product marketing launch strategies and execution, including prioritization, messaging hierarchy, product value prop and positioning, and go\-to\-market plans \- Work with our research and insights teams to deliver deep audience \& competitive insights to be used in product decision making. \- Partner closely with leaders in product, marketing, PR, public policy, operations, strategy and finance to ensure seamless cross\-functional coordination and go\-to\-market plans. Be the glue between teams and our users.


Qualifications


Minimum Qualifications \- Comfortable working in an experimental and extremely fast\-paced environment within a complex, matrixed organization \- High attention to detail and proven ability to manage multiple, competing priorities simultaneously. \- Excellent organization, project management, and problem\-solving skills \- High level of integrity as well as interpersonal skills as you often act as the “glue” between internal departments. \- Compelling storyteller who can communicate in succinct and inspiring ways to a variety of audiences, including internal stakeholders and external audiences. \- Product marketing experience at mobile/tech/consumer products used by millions, ideally in product marketing, with more recent experience related to Trust \& Safety or Responsibility marketing \- Experience in brand safety narratives and campaigns, trust and safety marketing, and reputation building story\-telling and product marketing Preferred Qualifications \- High level of integrity as well as interpersonal skills as you often act as the “glue” between internal departments. \- Compelling storyteller who can communicate in succinct and inspiring ways to a variety of audiences, including internal stakeholders and external audiences. \- Product marketing experience at mobile/tech/consumer products used by millions, ideally in product marketing, with more recent experience related to Trust \& Safety or Responsibility marketing \- Experience in brand safety narratives and campaigns, trust and safety marketing, and reputation building story\-telling and product marketing

Employees also receive 10 paid holidays per year, 10 paid sick days per year and 17 days of Paid Personal Time (prorated upon hire with increasing accruals by tenure).  



The Company reserves the right to modify or change these benefits programs at any time, with or without notice.

job_data.title: Product Manager Graduate (Measurement Signal and Privacy Product Team) - 2026 Start (PhD)
job_data.description:
Data analysis
  
  

Product Manager Graduate (Measurement Signal and Privacy Product Team) \- 2026 Start (PhD)
  
  

Location
  
:
  
  

San Jose
  
  

Employment Type
  
:
  
  

Regular
  
  

Job Code
  
:
  
  

A222586
  
  

Responsibilities
  
  

The Ads Measurement product team is looking for a new member to help build client\-facing measurement solutions that enable advertisers to assess the impact of their TikTok marketing on business returns. Through this experience, you will work with cross\-functional teams across the globe on products that touch 'millions' of advertisers.
  
  

We are looking for talented individuals to join our team in 2026\. As a graduate, you will get opportunities to pursue bold ideas, tackle complex challenges, and unlock limitless growth. Launch your career where inspiration is infinite at TikTok.
  
  

Successful candidates must be able to commit to an onboarding date by end of year 2026\. Please state your availability and graduation date clearly in your resume.
  
  

**Responsibilities:**  

* Set the vision, develop the roadmap, build and launch ad measurement products that help advertisers meet their goals and see their true business value generated by TikTok
* Define success metrics and analyze data to inform product strategy and prioritization
* Collaborate with cross\-functional teams to define goals and objectives for ad measurement products
* Partner with Engineering, Design, Data Science, Marketing and Sales to develop, test, and launch products
* Write all technical specs and product requirements for development


Qualifications
  
  

**Minimum Qualification(s):**  

* Final year Ph.D or recent Ph.D graduate in a quantitative field (statistics, economics, political science, computer science or related fields, with technical experience or project work preferred etc)
* Strong logical thinking and data analysis skills, with the ability to break down, analyze, and solve complex problems
* Strong organizational, planning, communication, and execution skills; self\-motivated and responsible, able to drive projects independently with reliability and simplicity;
* Proven ability to work cross\-functionally in a highly collaborative environment
* Must obtain work authorization in the country of employment at the time of hire and maintain ongoing work authorization during employment


**Preferred Qualification(s):**  

* A heavy user of internet products, curious and passionate about product design and user experience; prior product\-related internship or project experience is a plus
* Experience in ads monetization business and ecosystem
* Experience working with data teams and other technical teams
* Fluency in both English and Mandarin: the role involves frequent communication with global teams, clients and stakeholders in English\-speaking regions as well as Chinese\-speaking markets. Proficiency in Mandarin is essential to effectively engage with Chinese\-speaking partners, understand cultural nuances, and navigate business transactions in key markets, ensuring smooth cross\- cultural collaboration and market expansion


Job Information
  
  

【For Pay Transparency】Compensation Description (Annually)
  
  

The base salary range for this position in the selected city is $114000 \- $240000 annually.
  
  

​

Base pay is one part of the Total Package that is provided to compensate and recognize employees for their work, and this role may be eligible for additional discretionary bonuses/incentives, and restricted stock units.

Our company believes that criminal history may have a direct, adverse and negative relationship on the following job duties, potentially resulting in the withdrawal of the conditional offer of employment:

job_data.title: Software Engineer - Model Infrastructure, TikTok Feeds
job_data.description: Responsibilities About the Team: The TikTok Feeds Recommendation Architecture team is responsible for the design and development of TikTok's For You Feed recommendation system. Our scope spans the entire online and offline recommendation pipeline, including strategy, modeling, and data infrastructure. We build scalable and efficient infrastructure to support rapid algorithm iteration, tackle massive throughput challenges, and enhance system performance, cost-efficiency, and stability. Our mission is to abstract and generalize core infrastructure services, components, and productivity tools that empower the recommendation system at scale. About the Role: We are seeking talented Software Engineers to join our Model Infrastructure team. You will focus on the architecture and engineering challenges associated with large-scale recommendation models – from online inference to offline training. Your work will directly contribute to supporting increasingly complex models, solving bottlenecks in computation and storage, and enabling breakthrough innovations in recommendation algorithms. As large foundation models (in CV/NLP/multimodal and beyond) continue to advance, the recommendation domain is evolving towards leveraging powerful compute to gain deeper understanding of user intent and preferences. In this role, you'll help co-design system architecture and algorithm infrastructure to balance compute cost with recommendation effectiveness at scale. Responsibilities: - Build and optimize infrastructure for online inference and offline training of recommendation models. - Solve challenges posed by the combination of high model complexity, massive data, and large-scale deployments. - Work closely with algorithm researchers to co-design infrastructure aligned with cutting-edge machine learning frameworks and hardware accelerators. - Continuously improve model architecture, efficiency, and scalability to enable better user experiences. Abstract and build reusable infrastructure ...

job_data.title: Senior Product Manager - Creator & Content Ads
job_data.description: Responsibilities The mission of Creator & Content Ads is to provide cutting-edge and unique solutions via innovative products & advanced technology to enable and empower brands to thrive on TikTok. Creator & Content Ads is a form of advertising that encourages users or influencers to promote brands or products by creating high-quality content that is highly consistent with brand values and image through certain incentives such as traffic, monetary rewards, etc. At its core, this approach softens the ‘hard sell’ nature of traditional ads by leveraging storytelling, interactivity, and entertainment to engage audiences. It subtly conveys brand messaging and fosters emotional connections. Responsibilities: 1. Be responsible for building products of large-volume and high-quality creator content targeting brand clients, drive the evolution and innovation of UGC (User Generated Content) in the scenarios of brand advertising, continuously drive client budgets, and be accountable for the revenue of brand advertising. 2. Be responsible for the product workflow design of content submissions and content gameplay, including key modules such as creator recruitment, reward distribution, optimization of the creator's content submission experience, and innovative gameplay, and be accountable for creator experience metric of the product 3. Collaborate with the algorithm, improve the quality of UGC content and the effectiveness of traffic through measures such as optimizing the content pricing strategies, content distribution strategies, and be accountable for the performance of the product 4. Collaborate with global operations and sales, have an in-depth understanding of the brand advertising ecosystem, identify the needs of brand advertisers, propose brand advertising solutions related to creator content, and be accountable for the long-term strategies of product Qualifications Minimum Qualifications: - BA/BS degree. - 3+ years of product experience in Brand Ads or Creator Platform ...

We support a wide range of digital payments choices, making transactions secure, simple, smart and accessible. job_data.title: Product Manager Intern [TikTok-Product Infrastructure]- 2026 Summer (BS/MS)
job_data.description: Responsibilities Team Introduction: TikTok Product Infrastructure team's goal is to provide the best user experiences to create, consume, and enjoy content on TikTok. The team is focused on improving reliability, scalability, security of TikTok product infrastructure. We are looking for talented individuals to join us for an internship in 2026. Internships at TikTok aim to offer students industry exposure and hands-on experience. Turn your ambitions into reality as your inspiration brings infinite opportunities at TikTok. Internships at TikTok aim to provide students with hands-on experience in developing fundamental skills and exploring potential career paths. A vibrant blend of social events and enriching development workshops will be available for you to explore. Here, you will utilize your knowledge in real-world scenarios while laying a strong foundation for personal and professional growth. It runs for 12 weeks. Candidates can apply to a maximum of two positions and will be considered for jobs in the order you apply. The application limit is applicable to TikTok and its affiliates' jobs globally. Applications will be reviewed on a rolling basis. We encourage you to apply as early as possible. Please state your availability clearly in your resume (Start date, End date) Summer Start Dates: May 11th, 2026 May 18th, 2026 May 26th, 2026 June 8th, 2026 June 22nd, 2026 Responsibilities: Define clear and precise data metrics to best represent business performance and incorporate data, algorithms, research, and market analysis to shape product design. Dive deep into user needs, and conduct user research & analysis to conceptualize and build delightful experiences on TikTok through continuous iteration and experimentation. Be responsible for product success from end-to-end, including ideation, design, build, test, launch, and measure post-launch. Educate and influence both leaders and a wide range of cross-functional stakeholders to secure buy-in on product strategy and...

job_data.title: Global Product Solutions and Operations Manager, Search Ads Agency & API
job_data.description:
Commercial product (ads)
  
  

Global Product Solutions and Operations Manager, Search Ads Agency \& API
  
  

Location
  
:
  
  

San Jose
  
  

Employment Type
  
:
  
  

Regular
  
  

Job Code
  
:
  
  

A118312
  
  

Responsibilities
  
  

About the team
  
As the HQ Vertical Product Solutions and Operations Manager for Search Ads, you will be responsible for setting the go\-to\-market and product growth strategy for agency partners and platform partners. The activations include both TikTok Ads Manager and API integrations. You will partner closely with the product team and regional teams to develop the overall strategic direction and assess key gaps in our Search Ads offering.
  
  

You will use your experience and technical knowledge working with the Search Ads product team to develop the strategy, bring together cross\-functional stakeholders to execute your plans and align senior product leadership around those plans. You understand market trends, the competitive landscape, agency ecosystem and have experience applying those to positively influence advertisers, agencies, and other cross\-functional partners.
  
  

**Responsibilities:**  

* Lead and consolidate market assessment, quantitative analysis and qualitative feedback, represent agency partners across all regions internally with PM and Engineering teams, and define the go\-to\-market and product growth strategy for TikTok's ever\-evolving Search Ads product.
* Partner closely with regional counterparts, sales teams, and other key stakeholders, to deeply understand pain points, form business requirements, and prioritize solutions to influence the direction of product development.
* This individual must demonstrate a strong understanding of the broader advertising ecosystem as it pertains to Search Ads and the competitive landscape to develop strategic positioning and provide product feedback.
* You will be instrumental in setting and owning the product growth target by for agency and API, and ensuring flawless execution and operations against the strategy.
* Support alpha and beta programs for our Search Ads solutions and new features for agency partners and platform partners.
* Communicate the value proposition of new products to agency stakeholders and ensure that effective collateral and packages are created.
* Support agency pitching, account deep dive, workshop and T2T for large clients and agency partners.
* Drive product adoption and usage rates by supporting key market strategy and effective product support.
* Build an understanding of the most nascent TikTok Search Ads solutions and leverage these products to achieve customer goals.


Qualifications
  
  

**Minimum Qualifications:**  

* BA/BS degree or above.
* 5\+ years of experience within the digital advertising industry across search, marketplace, social, display, direct response, and/or ad networks with a keen understanding of Search Ads.
* Strong knowledge of agency landscape and experience working at agencies
* Experience partnering with product teams to identify and bring to market solutions for sellers.
* Strong knowledge of sales and marketing processes.
* Experience using Search Ads products from Search Ads 360, Google, Bing, Meta, Pinterest, Amazon, etc.
* Experience collaborating with cross\-functional teams to drive results, developing and executing against global launch plans to bring products to market.


**Preferred Qualifications:**  

* Experience in global roles.
* Product marketing experience in web \& mobile advertising and paid search, and successfully contributing at both strategic and tactical levels.
* Strong knowledge across key areas of monetization products including ads delivery, keyword bidding, search algo, targeting, privacy, brand safety, and suitability.
* Experience in influencing product management decisions.
* A commercial mindset with experience building business cases from market research and analysis.
* Experience in influencing behavior change of key stakeholders at a variety of levels within an organization.
* Strong knowledge of the competitive landscape of Search Ads


Job Information
  
  

【For Pay Transparency】Compensation Description (Annually)
  
  

The base salary range for this position in the selected city is $128000 \- $290160 annually.
  
  

​
  
  

Compensation may vary outside of this range depending on a number of factors, including a candidate’s qualifications, skills, competencies and experience, and location. Base pay is one part of the Total Package that is provided to compensate and recognize employees for their work, and this role may be eligible for additional discretionary bonuses/incentives, and restricted stock units.
  
  

​
  
  

Benefits may vary depending on the nature of employment and the country work location. Employees have day one access to medical, dental, and vision insurance, a 401(k) savings plan with company match, paid parental leave, short\-term and long\-term disability coverage, life insurance, wellbeing benefits, among others. Employees also receive 10 paid holidays per year, 10 paid sick days per year and 17 days of Paid Personal Time (prorated upon hire with increasing accruals by tenure).
  
  

​
  
  

The Company reserves the right to modify or change these benefits programs at any time, with or without notice.
  
  

​
  
  

**For Los Angeles County (unincorporated) Candidates:**  

​
  
  

Qualified applicants with arrest or conviction records will be considered for employment in accordance with all federal, state, and local laws including the Los Angeles County Fair Chance Ordinance for Employers and the California Fair Chance Act. Our company believes that criminal history may have a direct, adverse and negative relationship on the following job duties, potentially resulting in the withdrawal of the conditional offer of employment:
  
  

​
  
  

1\. Interacting and occasionally having unsupervised contact with internal/external clients and/or colleagues;
  
  

​
  
  

2\. Appropriately handling and managing confidential information including proprietary and trade secret information and access to information technology systems; and
  
  

​
  
  

3\. Exercising sound judgment.
  
  

​
  
  

About TikTok
  
  

TikTok is the leading destination for short\-form mobile video. At TikTok, our mission is to inspire creativity and bring joy. TikTok's global headquarters are in Los Angeles and Singapore, and we also have offices in New York City, London, Dublin, Paris, Berlin, Dubai, Jakarta, Seoul, and Tokyo.
  
  

​
  
  

Why Join Us
  
  

Inspiring creativity is at the core of TikTok's mission. Our innovative product is built to help people authentically express themselves, discover and connect – and our global, diverse teams make that possible. Together, we create value for our communities, inspire creativity and bring joy \- a mission we work towards every day.
  
  

​
  
  

We strive to do great things with great people. We lead with curiosity, humility, and a desire to make impact in a rapidly growing tech company. Every challenge is an opportunity to learn and innovate as one team. We're resilient and embrace challenges as they come. By constantly iterating and fostering an "Always Day 1" mindset, we achieve meaningful breakthroughs for ourselves, our company, and our users. When we create and grow together, the possibilities are limitless. Join us.
  
  

​
  
  

​
  
  

Diversity \& Inclusion
  
  

​
  
  

TikTok is committed to creating an inclusive space where employees are valued for their skills, experiences, and unique perspectives. Our platform connects people from across the globe and so does our workplace. At TikTok, our mission is to inspire creativity and bring joy. To achieve that goal, we are committed to celebrating our diverse voices and to creating an environment that reflects the many communities we reach. We are passionate about this and hope you are too.
  
  

​
  
  

TikTok Accommodation
  
  

TikTok is committed to providing reasonable accommodations in our recruitment processes for candidates with disabilities, pregnancy, sincerely held religious beliefs or other reasons protected by applicable laws. If you need assistance or a reasonable accommodation, please reach out to us at
  
  

https://tinyurl.com/RA\-request

job_data.title: Product Manager, Anti-Fraud Solutions - USDS
job_data.description: Responsibilities Team Intro: The Governance and Experience (GNE) is a global team responsible for ensuring our marketplace is safe and trustworthy for not only users but also sellers and creators. We value user satisfaction and work on policies, rules, and systems to ensure quality. As a Strategy Product Manager for Anti-Fraud Solutions, you will play a crucial role in developing risk control strategies by analyzing user behavior, content, and feedback. You will be responsible for improving product safety mechanisms and implementing risk solution plans. Collaborating with technical and analytical teams, you will build and enhance systems for risk perception, identification, intervention, and governance effect measurement. Your work will involve designing risk control products and services that support various business needs, ultimately reducing capital loss and improving metrics related to risk exposure. In this role, you will manage the prioritization of trade-offs among seller experience, user experience, creator experience, and platform performance. Engaging with diverse stakeholders across business, operations, technology, and security/risk, you will address risk challenges at scale. This position requires a strong analytical mindset, the ability to communicate effectively, and a proven track record of delivering results in a fast-paced environment. TikTok values creativity and innovation, and as part of our Governance and Experience team, you will contribute to ensuring a safe and trustworthy marketplace for users, sellers, and creators. In order to enhance collaboration and cross-functional partnerships, among other things, at this time, our organization follows a hybrid work schedule that requires employees to work in the office 3 days a week, or as directed by their manager/department. We regularly review our hybrid work model, and the specific requirements may change at any time. Responsibilities: - Develop forward-looking risk control strategies through an...

job_data.title: TikTok Shop Technical Product Operations, Technical Product Specialist - USDS
job_data.description:
Global Operations
  
  

TikTok Shop Technical Product Operations, Technical Product Specialist \- USDS
  
  

Location
  
:
  
  

San Jose
  
  

Employment Type
  
:
  
  

Regular
  
  

Job Code
  
:
  
  

A80729
  
  

Responsibilities
  
  

**Team Intro:**  

Governance and Experience (GNE) is a team responsible for ensuring our marketplace is safe and trustworthy for not only users, but also sellers and creators. The ideal candidate has a strong sense of ownership, and thrives in a fast\-paced environment where they can have a direct impact on resolving business\-critical issues for TikTok Shop.
  
  

In order to enhance collaboration and cross\-functional partnerships, among other things, at this time, our organization follows a hybrid work schedule that requires employees to work in the office 3 days a week, or as directed by their manager/department. We regularly review our hybrid work model, and the specific requirements may change at any time.
  
  

**Responsibilities:**  

* Work cross\-functionally between the internal Product Research \& Development Teams and ISVs (Independent Software Vendor), and merchants.
* Work in a small team with minimal supervision to drive improvements and innovative solutions to complex issues in an end\-to\-end project.
* Identify application performance roadblocks and implement optimizations for the growing Ecommerce ecosystem.
* Continuously track technical risks and gaps, while presenting mitigation strategies and recommendations to external and internal stakeholders on an on\-going basis.
* Test, troubleshoot, and enhance applications and user test cases.


Qualifications
  
  

**Minimum Qualifications:**  

* Bachelor's degree or above,
* 2\+ years of experience in E\-commerce space, technical support, solution engineering or equivalent.
* Familiarity with APIs, webhooks, debugging response codes, token auths, and other web technologies to understand problems end to end.
* Professional experience with at least one client\-side/server\-side language such as: JAVA / Python / Javascript, can read basic code logic.


**Preferred Qualifications:**  

* Comfortable working with internal and external stakeholders to address concerns while also demonstrating the ability to explain complex technical concepts to a non\-technical audience.
* Demonstrated ability to explain complex technical concepts to internal and external stakeholders.
* Comfortable working non\-standard work hours to collaborate with global teams.
* Strong cross\-team collaboration skills, self\-starter attitude with the ability to analyze and solve problems.
* Ability to manage multiple competing priorities in a fast\-paced collaborative environment.


Job Information
  
  

【For Pay Transparency】Compensation Description (Annually)
  
  

The base salary range for this position in the selected city is $103200 \- $244889 annually.
  
  

​
  
  

Compensation may vary outside of this range depending on a number of factors, including a candidate’s qualifications, skills, competencies and experience, and location. Base pay is one part of the Total Package that is provided to compensate and recognize employees for their work, and this role may be eligible for additional discretionary bonuses/incentives, and restricted stock units.
  
  

​
  
  

Benefits may vary depending on the nature of employment and the country work location. Employees have day one access to medical, dental, and vision insurance, a 401(k) savings plan with company match, paid parental leave, short\-term and long\-term disability coverage, life insurance, wellbeing benefits, among others. Employees also receive 10 paid holidays per year, 10 paid sick days per year and 17 days of Paid Personal Time (prorated upon hire with increasing accruals by tenure).
  
  

​
  
  

The Company reserves the right to modify or change these benefits programs at any time, with or without notice.
  
  

​
  
  

**For Los Angeles County (unincorporated) Candidates:**  

​
  
  

Qualified applicants with arrest or conviction records will be considered for employment in accordance with all federal, state, and local laws including the Los Angeles County Fair Chance Ordinance for Employers and the California Fair Chance Act. Our company believes that criminal history may have a direct, adverse and negative relationship on the following job duties, potentially resulting in the withdrawal of the conditional offer of employment:
  
  

​
  
  

1\. Interacting and occasionally having unsupervised contact with internal/external clients and/or colleagues;
  
  

​
  
  

2\. Appropriately handling and managing confidential information including proprietary and trade secret information and access to information technology systems; and
  
  

​
  
  

3\. Exercising sound judgment.
  
  

​
  
  

About USDS
  
  

TikTok is the leading destination for short\-form mobile video. Our mission is to inspire creativity and bring joy. U.S. Data Security (“USDS”) is a subsidiary of TikTok in the U.S. This new, security\-first division was created to bring heightened focus and governance to our data protection policies and content assurance protocols to keep U.S. users safe. Our focus is on providing oversight and protection of the TikTok platform and U.S. user data, so millions of Americans can continue turning to TikTok to learn something new, earn a living, express themselves creatively, or be entertained. The teams within USDS that deliver on this commitment daily span across Trust \& Safety, Security \& Privacy, Engineering, User \& Product Ops, Corporate Functions and more.
  
  

​
  
  

​
  
  

Data Security Statement
  
  

​
  
  

This role requires the ability to work with and support systems designed to protect sensitive data and information. As such, this role will be subject to strict national security\-related screening.
  
  

​
  
  

Why Join Us
  
  

Inspiring creativity is at the core of TikTok's mission. Our innovative product is built to help people authentically express themselves, discover and connect – and our global, diverse teams make that possible. Together, we create value for our communities, inspire creativity and bring joy \- a mission we work towards every day.
  
  

​
  
  

We strive to do great things with great people. We lead with curiosity, humility, and a desire to make impact in a rapidly growing tech company. Every challenge is an opportunity to learn and innovate as one team. We're resilient and embrace challenges as they come. By constantly iterating and fostering an "Always Day 1" mindset, we achieve meaningful breakthroughs for ourselves, our company, and our users. When we create and grow together, the possibilities are limitless. Join us.
  
  

​
  
  

​
  
  

Diversity \& Inclusion
  
  

​
  
  

TikTok is committed to creating an inclusive space where employees are valued for their skills, experiences, and unique perspectives. Our platform connects people from across the globe and so does our workplace. At TikTok, our mission is to inspire creativity and bring joy. To achieve that goal, we are committed to celebrating our diverse voices and to creating an environment that reflects the many communities we reach. We are passionate about this and hope you are too.
  
  

​
  
  

USDS Reasonable Accommodation
  
  

USDS is committed to providing reasonable accommodations in our recruitment processes for candidates with disabilities, pregnancy, sincerely held religious beliefs or other reasons protected by applicable laws. If you need assistance or a reasonable accommodation, please reach out to us at
  
  

https://tinyurl.com/USDS\-RA
